title: Hour 3 - Bill Plaschke
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Bill Plaschke
description:
Today on The Dan Patrick Show, LA Times Writer Bill Plaschke joined Dan to share his thoughts on the passing of legendary Dodgers broadcaster Vin Scully. Bill also chimed in on Rams QB Matt Stafford's injury and Lakers superstar LeBron James!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
